message: If you have difficulties in choosing the necessary products, our managers will be happy to advise you.
conditions: You can order our products 24 hours a day on the website, following the usual registration procedure, or by phone during business hours. Regular customers receive a accumulative discount card that will allow you to significantly save money. And our prices will definitely please you if you compare them with other online stores. In addition, if you are the owner of a store chain, then a 10% discount is already yours!
